description: This file provides API utility functions for interacting with a backend server, including user registration, login, game management, and leaderboard retrieval in a tic-tac-toe game project.
external_files: node-fetch or similar fetch API environment (implied by fetch usage)

methods.name: async function api( api
methods.description: Helper function to perform API calls to the backend, handling headers, authorization, and error processing.

methods.name: export async function registerUser(username: string, password: string) { registerUser
methods.description: Registers a new user with the given username and password.

methods.name: export async function loginUser(username: string, password: string) { loginUser
methods.description: Authenticates a user with the given username and password.

methods.name: export async function startGame() { startGame
methods.description: Starts a new game session via the backend API with authentication.

methods.name: export async function fetchGame(gameId: string) { fetchGame
methods.description: Retrieves details of a specific game by game ID with authentication.

methods.name: export async function makeMove(gameId: string, position: number) { makeMove
methods.description: Sends a move to the backend for a specific game, indicating the position played.

methods.name: export async function getLeaderboard() { getLeaderboard
methods.description: Fetches the leaderboard data from the backend API.

methods.name: export async function getUserGames(userId: string) { getUserGames
methods.description: Retrieves list of games for a specific user.
